name: QrPngCanvasOptions
summary: Canvas options for sticker-style QR output.

properties.name: Splash
properties.summary: Optional paint splash/drip overlay (kept outside the QR area).

properties.name: Halo
properties.summary: Optional halo/glow drawn around the QR bounds (outside by default).

properties.name: Vignette
properties.summary: Optional edge vignette drawn on the canvas (QR-safe by default).

properties.name: Grain
properties.summary: Optional grain/noise texture drawn on the canvas (QR-safe by default).

properties.name: Frame
properties.summary: Optional decorative frame drawn around the QR bounds (kept outside the QR area).

properties.name: Band
properties.summary: Optional decorative band drawn outside the QR bounds (quiet-zone ring).

properties.name: Badge
properties.summary: Optional badge/tab/ribbon drawn outside the QR bounds.

properties.name: BorderPx
properties.summary: Border thickness in pixels (0 = no border).
